bugs.title: CVE-2023-49990 espeak-ng: buffer overflow in SetUpPhonemeTable function at synthdata.c

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2023-49990 espeak-ng: buffer overflow in SetUpPhonemeTable function at synthdata.c

long_desc.thetext:
CVE-2023-49990

Espeak-ng 1.52-dev was discovered to contain a buffer-overflow via the function SetUpPhonemeTable at synthdata.c.

https://github.com/espeak-ng/espeak-ng/issues/1824

Created espeak-ng tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2254237]

bugs.title: CVE-2023-49991 espeak-ng: buffer underflow in CountVowelPosition function at synthdata.c

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2023-49991 espeak-ng: buffer underflow in CountVowelPosition function at synthdata.c

long_desc.thetext:
CVE-2023-49991

Espeak-ng 1.52-dev was discovered to contain a Stack Buffer Underflow via the function CountVowelPosition at synthdata.c.

https://github.com/espeak-ng/espeak-ng/issues/1825

Created espeak-ng tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2254239]
